message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within a certain budget.

I understand that you're on a budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $11000, but that's as low as I can go. I really think you'll love this product, and I'm confident it's worth it to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. Can you consider that?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product, so I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $11500, but that's as low as I can go. I'm confident you'll love this product and it's worth every penny to you.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm really not comfortable going any lower than my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I'm not going to go any lower. This is my final offer.
